content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with The Calculated Risk, the January 19, 1951, episode from The New Adventures Of Nero Wolfe.

(29:05) Our second story is The Lady Loved Larceny, from Walk Softly, Peter Troy. That story originally aired December 24, 1963.

Download CaseClosed726

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’d like to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
